DW, if the checkbox viewer hasn't been initialized yet, won't the call to getSite().getPage() cause 
another NPE a few lines down?

The view is created, so it's site and page exist. The viewer within the page 
does not yet exist since the view was never brought to the top of the stack.
Ignore my last comment it should have been gone into bug 72449
